Help Center What should I do if I didn\'t receive coins after purchase? 1. Please double check if the money was deducted successfully. 2. In some cases, coins may be delayed. Please sign out your LivU account first and log in again, then check if you have received the coins. 3. If coins are still not received after trying all above, please send us your LivU ID and Google Play order number via email (service@livu.me). We will verify it and solve the problem ASAP. Call Coupons will be used preferentially if its balance is sufficient to cover at least one-minute; if the balance can not cover even one minute, coins will be deducted instead. VIP rights Unlimited use of translation VIP exclusive logos VIP exclusive profile frames VIP exclusive entry effect Use rear camera VIP exclusive gifts If you have received multiple VIP experience cards, your total experience time will be accumulated. Cards and Coupons Descripyion Call Coupons Description - Can only be used for calling someone at the Goddess Wall or calling your friends who consumes minute billing. - Call Coupons will be used preferentially if its current balance is sufficient to cover at least one minute; if the balance is insufficient to cover even one minute, Coins will be deducted instead Lucky Draw Coupons Description - Can only be used for turntables that support using Lucky Draw Coupons. - Lucky Draw Coupons will be used preferentially if its current balance is sufficient to cover a Lucky Draw; if the balance is insufficient for even one time, Coins will be deducted instead. Match Coupons Description - It can be used for gender select matching. - Match Coupons will be used preferentially if its current balance is sufficient to cover one time filter match; if the balance is insufficient to cover even one time, Coins will be deducted instead.
